com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin

Class AdminResponseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin.AdminResponseController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin/response")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service.data")
public class AdminResponseController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView objects and object of the Response class for admins. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request.
    See Also:
    Response, ResponseService

    • Field Summary

      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Response class.

      Removes all responses and redirects by url /admin/responses.

      Removes response with url and redirects by url /admin/responses.
      org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView reverseValidResponse(long id, org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
